result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Maximilian Quinn Maher

records.addlTxt:
1:52 PM Attorney Joseph M. Schieffer in Court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Maximilian Quinn Maher in Court pro se.  ADA Schieffer notes prior discussion w/Defendant.  Questions if Defendant is going to retain counsel.  Defendant questions offer.  ADA Schieffer requests additional Status.  Court confirms Defendant's address.  ADA Schieffer will speak with Defendant re: offer after hearing.  Adjourned at 1:5 PM
Status conference scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Status conference on November 14, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

2:30 PM Maximilian Quinn Maher does not appear in Court,  Atty Joseph M. Schieffer for the State of Wisconsin. Court notes DE called and thought this hearing was by phone. ADA Schieffer is requesting a warrant be issued but stayed. Court will authorize warrant but stay until the next hearing. Court adjourned at 2:32 pm.
Status conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Status conference on October 17, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Status conference on September 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on June 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on April 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

NO CONTACT WHATSOEVER WITH M.R.N.
Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Not to possess or comsume alcohol.

9:56 AM Defendant Maximilian Quinn Maher appears  in Court, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. NG. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $2,500.00 SIBS w/conditions of NC w/NRM and AS, no objection. Court so orders. Court adjourned at 9:58 am.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
